title: Ranked Flex is so Unfair (Gold versing Diamond and challengers) WTF!
body:
Me and my friend playing rank flex game. We're setting on gold V then suddenly we are versing challengers and diamond players. THIS IS NOT FAIR !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! 
PLEASE.......

replies.body: Yes, we all know it's unfair. Anybody that has played flex queue since it opened has been subject to the ridiculous matchmaking that is screwing everything up. [Riot are looking into the issue](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/u2iR6nTU-ranked-flex-match-making-issues), and will be coming up with a solution in the next week or so ~
im bronze 2, got placed against dimaonds in like 4 of my games
